caption.title: Cx. tarsalis Feeding Patterns, Avian Population Dynamics, and West Nile Virus Epidemiology
caption.p: Fraction of Cx. tarsalis feedings from mammals (±1 SE), abundances of American robins [birds/survey in (A), birds/hectare ±1 SD in (B)], and the number of human WNV cases in 2004 in California (A) and Colorado (B).
